attributes.action: Stop the labour party destroying the British countryside.
attributes.additional_details: This must be stopped.Apart from not having any infrastructure to support this huge increase in population, it will increase flooding and destroy unique habitats and decimate wildlife. It will also remove green spaces that are essential for well being and mental health.In addition, the net zero madness will see the remaining green spaces carpeted in solar panels. This  must be stopped. We cannot allow this wantondestruction of our green and pleasant land.
attributes.background: The labour party have extensive plans to build on green belt areas and completely disregard the views if the British people . They have already stated that wild life will not be allowed to get in the way of house building .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban all developments in high wildlife areas 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705032
